name: Two in The Dark
description:
If you have played the game Binary Land on the NES, this game was inspired by it and will surprise you.

The story is about two lovers who descend into dangerous catacombs to find treasures. But they are separated by unusual magic and now their actions mirror each other's actions. And they can only leave the room together. Will you be able to cope with the difficulties that fell on the head of these lovers.

PS:

Thanks to a member of the YouTube community - TOOT, for providing the art.
